She was known for her autobiography All but My Life (1957) and it was made into a 1995 short movie, One Survivor Remembers, which received an Academy Award and an Emmy Award.Personal Histories: Gerda Weissmann Klein and Kurt Klein , United States Holocaust Memorial Museum. Retrieved 2013-06-15. On February 15, 2011, Klein was presented with the Presidential Medal of Freedom by President Barack Obama.
